Description:
PN/DO/TRCML/190122/01
You have failed to take suitable and sufficient measures to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, a person falling a distance liable to cause serious personal injury e.g.The scaffold has areas from which a person can fall i.e. missing guard rails.

PN/DO/TRCML/190122/02
You have failed to provide suitable and sufficient platforms, coverings, guard rails or other similar means of support or protection to prevent a fall or measures to minimise the distance or consequences of a fall e.g insufficient boards, safety nets, anchor points.

IN/DO/TRCML/200122/01
You are carrying out work with asbestos containing materials at the above location without ensuring that your employees who were liable to be exposed to asbestos or those who supervised your employees were given adequate training to carry out non-licensed asbestos work.
